alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 2:58PM MDT until September 09 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... North central Fall River County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 257 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pringle, or 10 miles northwest of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs, Buffalo Gap, Pringle, Argyle, Wind Cave National Park, Cottonwood Springs Dam, Maverick Junction, Cold Brook Reservoir, and northwestern Angostura Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
